articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Russia eyes 2024 Paris Olympics despite sports bans
articles.description: Russia is making plans for its athletes to live and compete in the French capital when the Paris Olympics start in 2024 even though many of the country's athletes remain barred from upcoming qualification events because of the war in Ukraine
articles.content: PARIS -- With two years to go until the Paris Olympics open, Russia is making plans for its athletes to live and compete in the French capital even though many remain barred from upcoming qualificati… [+1707 chars]
